dataList.name: Unrelenting Spirit - Shin [剛氣-心]
dataList.desc:
- Turn Start: gain 1 Damage Up and 1 Power Up for every 15% missing HP on self (max 5 each)
- Inflict +3 more Tremor Potency and +1 more Tremor Count with this unit's Skills
- If this unit's Speed is faster than the target's by 3 or more, deal +(Speed difference x 5)% damage (max 40%)
- Convert the final Coins of 'Double Slash - Blast' and 'Triple Slash - Burst' to Unbreakable Coins

dataList.name: Candy
dataList.desc:
Max Stack: 99
- Are your hoarding candy all for yourself?

dataList.name: Hunger-Rage
dataList.desc:
Max Stack: 3
I'm starving. I want candy now

dataList.name: Indulged
dataList.desc: Turn Start: for every 2 Stack, gain 1 Clash Power Down (max 5)

dataList.name: Candy
dataList.desc:
- Low Morale
- When Clashing against Identities with [GiveMeCandy], Clash Power +3; when clashing against other Identities, Clash Power -1

dataList.name: Candy
dataList.desc:
- Panic
- When Clashing against Identities with [GiveMeCandy], Clash Power +5; when clashing against other Identities, Clash Power -2

dataList.name: IN WHICH IS RECOUNTED THE LIBERATION FROM BLOOD THICKER THAN WATER
dataList.desc:
- At every Turn End: gain 1 Haste and 3 Offense Level Up next turn
- Gain 2 additional Offense Level Up after every 3 cumulative turns (max 6)
- On Clash Win, heal 3 SP
- On Kill, gain 1 Clash Power Up next turn (once per turn)

dataList.name: In which is recounted the thralldom to blood thicker than water.
dataList.desc:
- Gain 2 additional Hardblood every time this unit gains Hardblood. (5 times per turn)
- At every Turn End: gain 2 Haste and 3 Offense Level Up next turn
- Gain 2 additional Offense Level Up after every 3 cumulative turns (max 6)
- On Clash Win, heal 3 SP
- On Kill, gain 1 Clash Power Up next turn (once per turn)

dataList.name: O compatriots of my dear child
dataList.desc:
Clash Power +1 per Stack (max 4)
Deal +5% damage

dataList.name: Dream her dream together in my stead
dataList.desc:
Clash Power +2 for every value (max 8)
- Apply Shield to self and all allies at Combat Start
- On Hit, deal 1 fixed damage

dataList.name: Backup Candy
dataList.desc:
Turn End: at less than 60% HP...
Heal 30% HP, heal 15 SP, lose 1 Backup Candy, and 1 Hunger
At 0 Stack, apply 1 Incandescent Indulgence, then expires

dataList.name: Hunger
dataList.desc:
Max Stack: 3
Turn End: gain 2 Offense Level Up and 1 Damage Up next turn for every Stack
At max Stack(3), lose 5% HP at Turn End

dataList.name: Incandescent Indulgence
dataList.desc:
Gain 30% base HP for this Encounter
Turn Start: fully heal HP and SP (once per Encounter)
